about_the_game:
Reverse Defense is a single-player game where you take on the role of a powerful, card-wielding wizard determined to crush your foes once and for all. After ages of enduring their attacks, it's your turn to strike back. Combine first-person action with strategic deckbuilding, tactical planning, and troop summoning to launch your assault. Command your army, break through their defenses, and reshape the battlefield in an adventure where strategy and action collide.

Game features:

  • Create and customize your own card deck with unique troop and skill cards

    Choose the deck that best suits your playstyle. However, you may need to adapt to enemies' elemental affinities or environmental conditions.

  • Seamlessly swap between weapons

    You will take two weapons and your deck of cards into the battlefield. Swap between them to best adapt to your current situation.

  • Give direct commands to your troops

    You can pick your troops individually and move them around the battlefield. You can also direct your entire group of troops to a specific target.

  • Choose your own path toward the enemy's castle

    Battlefields give you the freedom to choose where you want to strike. Different paths mean different sets of enemies and elemental affinities that you will have to deal with.

  • Explore your enemies' worlds and capture their defensive castles to reach their most important stronghold. Each world offers unique challenges and rewards. Conquer them, and you may find a special souvenir - whether it's a new card for your collection, a powerful weapon, or a valuable buff. Will you find these rewards to grow even stronger?

Choose your weapons and conquer your enemies.

Patience Wanes, Even for Immortals

Explore the mysterious realm of Cardenfell, where a powerful wizard grew weary of defending his castle and decided to take the fight to his enemies' doorsteps.

short_description: Step into the heat of battle in this real time, first-person action-strategy game where your deck of cards is the key to victory. Will you break through the defenses head-on or take a more strategic route to victory? The choice is yours — every path is different.
